title: Your children and you
creator_credit: Brian Smith and British Ministry of Health
brief_description: Child care in the first years of life. Many hints on the correct care of infants and young children are given, from the weaning of the infant to the prevention of unnecessary fears, boredom, bad temper and maladjustment.
creator_credit_for_label: Brian Smith and British Ministry of Health
